name: Google Docs Dark UI
description: A very minimal-code theme to darken the main UI of Google Docs. Not a complete overhaul, but enough to keep the website from blinding you. Built for and tested on Firefox 41+, works on Chromium 45.
additional_info:
Some design was inspired by and made to match the Vertex GTK theme: 
https://github.com/horst3180/Vertex-theme


Feel completely free to use and edit this in any way you want. In fact, if someone wants to take the time to extend the dark mode to the entire UI (besides the actual page content, that needs to stay as is, or others' public documents will come out looking awful), I'd happily switch over to that one.

Release Notes

Version 1.0, Oct 26 2015:
Initial release.

discussions.name: This download shows up in EVERY website  (in google)
It gets the job done, could use an update however.
